title: Organic Flaxseed Oil (Cold-Pressed)
excerpt: Cold-pressed flaxseed oil rich in ALA omega-3 fatty acids to support circulation, heart health, and nourished Vata tissues.
content:
## What Is This Flaxseed Oil?
A pure, cold-pressed flaxseed (linseed) oil rich in ALA-based omega-3 fatty acids. Ideal for nourishing Vata tissues, supporting skin hydration, and aiding cardiovascular wellness.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Flaxseed is grounding, unctuous, and warm when used in small doses. It supports lubrication of joints, nourishes dry tissues, and balances Vata.

### Key Benefits
- Supports circulation and heart wellness.
- Hydrates and nourishes dry skin from within.
- Provides plant-based omega-3s.

## Ingredients
- 100% cold-pressed flaxseed oil

## Usage Instructions
- Take **1 tsp daily** with food.
- Not recommended for high-heat cooking; use on salads, smoothies, or after cooking.

## Packaging
- Dark amber bottle to protect from oxidation.
- Includes refrigeration and storage instructions.

## Safety & Consultation
- Consult a healthcare provider if pregnant, on blood thinners, or with digestive sensitivity.
